name: drive
desc: drive forward/backward for the specified distance, steering toward the specified angle

subs.name: x
subs.desc: omni left/right distance(feet) positive(+) is right, negative(-) is left

subs.name: y
subs.desc: distance to drive (in feet) positive (+) is forwards, negative (-) is backwards  (Distances are from last encpder recet)

subs.name: heading
subs.desc: angle to steer toward while driving (clockwise is positive, 0 = drive straight)

name: goto
desc: Transfers execution to the specified command index based on conditions

name: init
desc: Transfers execution to the specified command index based on conditions

name: ToteDrive
desc: Transfers execution to the specified command index based on conditions

subs.name: speed
subs.desc: How fast to go to the tote
